title: UI Button Alignment Issue1
description: The buttons in the sidebar are not aligned properly across different screen sizes.

title: UI Button Alignment Issue2
description: The buttons in the sidebar are across different screen sizes.

title: Database Query Optimization
description: Some queries are taking too long to execute, and need to be optimized for performance.

title: Implement Dark Mode
description: Add a dark mode toggle to improve accessibility for users with visual impairments.

title: Add Error Handling for API Calls
description: The app currently doesn't handle API errors gracefully. Add error handling for failed API requests.

title: Improve Mobile Responsiveness
description: The app layout is not properly responsive on mobile devices, especially in landscape mode.

title: Implement Search Functionality
description: Add a search bar to allow users to search for issues and tasks within the application.

title: Refactor User Profile Page
description: The user profile page is cluttered and needs to be reorganized for better usability and readability.
